content: 🔪🔪🔪 Rug Pull Token 🧄🧄🧄Website | Twitter | InstagramWhat is RPTFor those who have been rug-pulled by any whatever shit token, RPT is a badge for you.How does it work?Write a tweet about how you've been rug-pulled, and mentions our twitter account (@rug_pull_token) in your tweent. We will be notified and send you free RPT. Why?❤️ Hope this can make you feel better. ❤️
